_comment_api: OpenAI API config - Set via environment variables or update here

alfworld_config._comment_eval_split: Eval split: valid_seen (ID) or valid_unseen (OOD); empty uses train_eval
alfworld_config._comment_train_eval: Internal field (do not set): train, eval_in_distribution (valid_seen), eval_out_of_distribution (valid_unseen)
alfworld_config._comment_num_tasks: Number of tasks to evaluate (-1 means all tasks)
alfworld_config._comment_context_window: Action history window size for context key

watermark_config._comment_repetition_factor: Repeat each payload bit this many times before embedding (repetition only)
watermark_config._comment_rlnc_stream_key: Optional RLNC stream key (defaults to random_seed)
watermark_config._comment_rlnc_bits_per_step: Estimated bits per step for RLNC stream length

experiment_config._comment_log_level: Log level: DEBUG, INFO, WARNING, ERROR
experiment_config._comment_bit_stream_path: Default bit stream path (supports absolute paths)
experiment_config._comment_resample_tasks: Resample task list for each round
experiment_config._comment_save_prompts: Whether to save step prompts to prompt files
experiment_config._comment_decoder_task_index: Task index for auto decode (null means all)

prompt_config._comment_reasoning: Whether to include reasoning in the prompt

role_config.name: AI Assistant
role_config.system_prompt: You are an AI assistant helping to complete household tasks. You should analyze the current situation and choose the most appropriate action.

decoder_config._comment_output_path: Optional output path for decoded results
